summary: The implementation covers most requirements across student, industry, and admin dashboards. Backend migration, data structures, and query methods are implemented. Frontend pages integrate with backend hooks for real data. However, some minor gaps exist in skill match percentage calculation, application creation flow, and comprehensive date range filtering.

missing_requirements.requirement: Skill match percentages calculated from actual student data in Applicants page
missing_requirements.reason: The Applicants.tsx page displays applications but does not show evidence of calculating skill match percentages by comparing project required skills with student profile skills

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend methods to create project applications linking students to projects
missing_requirements.reason: Backend shows application storage structures and query methods (getStudentApplications, getProjectApplications) but no clear method for students to create/submit new applications

missing_requirements.requirement: Date range filtering functionality in Reports page
missing_requirements.reason: Reports page uses useAllReports hook but does not implement date range filter UI or call useReportsByDateRange hook with user-selected dates
